thread.title: Swansea star Andre Ayew reveals Tottenham stalemate as catalyst for first home defeat against Stoke City
thread.title_full: Swansea star Andre Ayew reveals Tottenham stalemate as catalyst for first home defeat against Stoke City

title: Swansea star Andre Ayew reveals Tottenham stalemate as catalyst for first home defeat against Stoke City
text:
15:55 CET Swansea star Andre Ayew reveals Tottenham stalemate as catalyst for first home defeat against Stoke City - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew 
Andre Ayew had identified the home draw against Tottenham Hotspurs as the catalyst to Swansea's first home loss on Monday night. 
The Swans have been on the back of a terrible run following an impressive start to the season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
